title: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT! Come play vs the Boards Dev Team!
body:
GAME NAME: TEAMFIGHT
PASSWORD: BoardMadness

Server: NA

Let's play! {{champion:111}}

replies.body: I'm so happy you're doing this. I got a chance to play with the support team but I'm currently not able to play. will you be doing this every Tuesday? I would love a chance to talk the game and play it with you all as well.
We usually do this every Tuesday at 2pm PST, yeah :D

There should be a night crew that plays games with the community every now and again. I am stationed in Okinawa, Japan. Myself and  quite a few of my friends here avid members of the LoL community as well as loyal to our NA roots. My ping may be in the 200s but that wont stop me from outplaying the dev team :)

Give me a timeframe, and I'll set up a game for you guys!

(I was in the Army myself) <3

The best time for us here would probably be 2/3am there in California. We understand if it won't work out but thank you for your response. We appreciate everything you guys do to help the community experience.

it was fun :p.u weren't there though.
{{champion:110}} - out
{{champion:40}} {{item:3070}}
I was in a ranked game that went REALLY long ;____;
No joke 56:50 is long. break time

Agreed 
AP{{champion:104}}
I wanna play~!

> [{quoted}](name=VenniVannie,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FaqQLU0A,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-01T21:02:00.230+0000)
>
> I wanna play~!

Come play!!!
Wish I could, but my internet is wonky during the afternoon :(
This is under custom games, right?
I wanna play I cant wait.
Hey boards dev team, why don't people from other regions get forum emblems? If you want to unite people (which is great) atleast give them the same rights and privileges.
for 11 IP? no thanks
I hope they do another one.
We only had time for one today :( very busy, a few of us were at PAX! But we do it every week so feel free to drop by!
Thanks for the info. :D
I want to play, but beware, I haven't played a non-custom game in a month :P
I'll play! :D
Too late {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
pls invite me!
I really would if my Acc wasnt banned at the moment :(
I wanna play, but I have to go. DARN IT ALL.
you guys just doing one?
does happen something similar on ew?
